body.p: Sea water has a pH around 8 and lemon juice has a pH of 2. Which has the most free protons in solution?

response.name: Sea water
response.feedback: Incorrect. Remember that pH and proton concentration are inversely related.

response.name: Lemon Juice
response.feedback: Correct. The lower the pH, the greater the number of free protons in solution.

part.hint: Refer to the pH scale in the text. Observe that as pH increases, free proton concentration [H+] decreases.
Remember as pH increases the concentration of ions decreases.
